title: The Big backyard: the outback of South Australia
creator_contributor_role: Milton Ingerson Film and Television Productions, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Birdsville Track (S. Aust. and Qld.)
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/South Australia - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Sturts Stony Desert (S. Aust.)
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Opal mines and mining
description: A young couple, on their honeymoon, travel in a four-wheel drive vehicle to the north and north-eastern areas of South Australia On their journey they see many points of interest including the opal mines of Coober Pedy, Lake Eyre, the Birdsville Track and Sturt's Stony Desert and the varying barren landscapes of the outback of Australia. Cast: Christina Mackay and Bill Cain. Photographer: David Foreman.
